title: Anitore! XX: Hitotsu Yane no Shita de
original_name: あにトレ! XX~ひとつ屋根の下で~
ending_song: "Cheer for you" by Asami Hoshi (Miku Itou), Eri Higuchi (Azumi Waki), Shizuno Saotome (Miyu Komaki), Shion Tachibana (Maria Naganawa), Yuu Hiraoka (Kanon Takao)
sinopse:
Sequel of Anitore! EX.

New member Sakura Izumi joins the five idol candidates of the previous season. A second year middle schooler, she often wears a big smile on her face.

(Source: ANN)
